name: !Zelda
description:
This is a multiple character game similar in style to the GameBoy Legend of Zelda games (to the point that the in progress art assets are ripped from the Seasons games and Link's Awakening)

You can move with the rrow keys and swap characters with space.

There's little features programmed in to far but that's cause I'm trying to get all the animations and basic features working before adding tools and invintory.

The plan for this game is that instead of finding equipment to unlock new avenues of exploration the player can find new people they can bring on their adventure who each have their own skills. The Dancer (Din) can jump small holes, the Swordsman (Link) has a sheild and can move heavy objects, the Singer (Naru) can talk to animals and not be attacked by monsters and the Princess (Zelda) can do and undo magic.

While the spritework did start as rips from the GB games they have had to be edited to give all the characters all the basic movement sprites.

===========
Last Update:
Camera moves in GB Zelda style
===========

+++++++++++
Next Update:
Picking up and throwing objects
+++++++++++
